hero.headline: I BUILD LIKE I GIVE A DAMN.
hero.subhead: From messy MVPs to scaled systems — I turn ambiguity into shipped product.

whatIDo.label: WHAT I DO
whatIDo.content:
I step in when things are unclear, stalled, or fragile — and leave behind structure, velocity, and shipped outcomes.
Discovery → Scope → System → Launch.

activeProject.title: Right Click Save (RCS 2.0)
bullets: Leading 0→1 rebuild of the platform layer for a global digital art publication.
Translating editorial + Web3 vision into scoped MVPs with real shipping cadence.
Designing community mechanics (reputation, access control, contribution flows).
Establishing async-first product ops across a global remote team.

ventures.title: WriteClique
bullets: Built LLM-powered editing pipelines to move manuscripts from draft to structural clarity.
Architected prompt-chain logic for plot consistency and character continuity.
Designed feedback loops that feel like editor-quality critique, not chatbot output.
Built marketplace from 0 to acquisition.
Scaled to 17,000+ listings and 40+ daily physical deliveries.
Drove $100k+ MRR pre-exit.
Owned two mobile apps across 3 continents.
Launched region expansions for millions of farmers.
Led daily shipping decisions under enterprise constraints.
Launched prepaid card product for India’s largest private bank.
Architected scalable KYC and compliance modules.
Designed system capable of supporting 1M+ concurrent transactions.
Architected POS + inventory SaaS for emerging markets.
Scaled to 1,000+ stores with offline-first sync.
Integrated subscription billing and AI support flows.
Designed GPT-powered journaling assistant for Gen Z users.
Built AI recap engine and tone-aware reflection system.
Defined freemium monetization model.

howIOperate.label: HOW I OPERATE
items: I protect velocity without sacrificing clarity.

cta.text: If you're looking for someone to take ownership and move the needle — not just manage tickets — let’s talk.
